name: Ocean Marble Blast:Legend Shot
description:
Ocean Marble Blast: Legend Shoot is a marble shooter game which is similar to other classic marble shooter Style Games but has lots of new and amazing features!Your target is to eliminate all the marbles lines, but don't let the chain reach the end.
How to play:
Touch the screen where you want to shoot marble lines.
Match 3 or more same Marbles shoot to blast them.
Create more Combos and Chains to get higher.
